text: Thank you for singing at our wedding function, it was a beautiful evening - Dipesh & I thoroughly enjoyed the selection of romantic Bollywood songs.
author: Bina & Dipesh

text: What an amazing musical evening, great versatile singers and a joy to listen to some golden classic songs.
author: Miss Priya. P

text: You guys were fantastic, loved the music. We just couldn't stop dancing !
author: Mrs Dipti. S
from: Dinner and Dance at Mumbai Gardens

text: Amazing voices, amazing evening ! A truly memorable performance.
author: Mrs. Hansaben. M

text: Thank you Vaibhavi & team, my father really enjoyed his 80th surprise birthday party. We'll definitely be recommending your band to our friends and family.
author: Mrs. Arti. M
from: Birthday Party - Private Function at Mumbai Junction
